content:
Anyone interested in a mostly complete port of Custom Breadcrumbs? I changed my mind that it's too much for the current upgrade project I've got. But I've gotten it working fairly well. I could just put it on github.com/backdrop-contrib and not release it.

Backdrop CMS contributed projects
Join the group at https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib to add your own! - Backdrop CMS contributed projects
I'd take a look at some point, I say do it

okay @Laryn I've put it here https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/custom_breadcrumbs.

backdrop-contrib/custom_breadcrumbs
Allows administrators to set up parametrized breadcrumb trails for any node type, taxonomy, path, etc. - backdrop-contrib/custom_breadcrumbs
